title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile:  "Toll""
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right:  TOLL
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract design of bright colors of curving and straight around a central void.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile:  "Toll"".
Pastel/crayon on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-115.
